Attributes.description: Introductory research methods course for students who wish to be critical readers rather than producers of educational research. Develops skills for locating, understanding, interpreting and critiquing educational empirical research. May not be used as a prerequisite to EPSE 592 or EPSE 596.
Attributes.prereq: Pre-reqs: (Please consult the Faculty of Science Credit Exclusion Lists http://www.calendar.ubc.ca/vancouver/index.cfm?tree=12,215,410,414 before registering. )
